Package me.dessie.dessielib.particleapi.transform.transformations

Class ParticleRotate

java.lang.Object
me.dessie.dessielib.particleapi.transform.ParticleTransform
me.dessie.dessielib.particleapi.transform.transformations.ParticleRotate
public class ParticleRotate extends ParticleTransform
Rotates the entire ShapedParticle based on the provided function.

  • Constructor Details

    • ParticleRotate

      public ParticleRotate(TransformType type, int frames, BiFunction<org.bukkit.Location,Integer,org.bukkit.util.Vector> transform)
      Parameters:
      type - The TransformType of this Transformation.
      frames - Over how many animation frames this transformation will be applied. A "frame" is when the ParticleAnimator renders the Particle. The TransformType will determine how the cycle behaves once the frame cap is reached.
      transform - The transformation function. Should return a Vector with how much to rotate on the X, Y, and Z axes.

    • ParticleRotate

      public ParticleRotate(TransformType type, int frames, BiFunction<org.bukkit.Location,Integer,org.bukkit.util.Vector> transform, org.bukkit.util.Vector offset)
      Parameters:
      type - The TransformType of this Transformation.
      frames - Over how many animation frames this transformation will be applied. A "frame" is when the ParticleAnimator renders the Particle. The TransformType will determine how the cycle behaves once the frame cap is reached.
      transform - The transformation function. Should return a Vector with how much to rotate on the X, Y, and Z axes.
      offset - A Vector with the origin offset for the rotation.

  • Method Details

    • applyToPoints

      public void applyToPoints(org.bukkit.Location location, List<org.bukkit.util.Vector> points)
      Description copied from class: ParticleTransform
      This method is used to directly apply the transformation function. The location of each Vector can be modified directly. To obtain the transformation function result, use ParticleTransform.apply(Location).
      Specified by:
      applyToPoints in class ParticleTransform
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the ShapedParticle that is being transformed.
      points - The locations of all the particles that make up the ShapedParticle.
